name: Jacob
descriptions: Jacob (simply called Van Graff thug in-game) was a former guard for the Van Graffs in Freeside.

Jacob was one of many guards employed at the Silver Rush. For a time, he and Gloria Van Graff, his boss and owner of the Silver Rush, were a couple. That was until Gloria found him at Gomorrah employing one of the prostitutes. Afterward, Gloria kidnapped him and kept him in the Silver Rush to then use as a test to show the effectiveness of their energy weapons to Mr. Soren.
Jacob has no interactions with the player character and is only seen during the Van Graff introduction being executed.
Jacob appears in Fallout: New Vegas.
